metadata.title: CVE-2017-14160 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The bark_noise_hybridmp function in psy.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.5allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds accessand application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted mp4 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14160` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvorbis0a - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1
libvorbisenc2 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1
libvorbisfile3 - 1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-3ubuntu0.2+esm1').
